itemDisplayName: Deploy a simple VM Scale Set with Linux VMs
description: This template allows you to deploy a simple VM Scale Set of Linux VMs using the lastest patched version of Ubuntu Linux 15.04 or 14.04.2-LTS. These VMs are behind a load balancer with NAT rules for ssh connections.
summary: This template deploys a VM Scale Set of Linux VMs behind a load balancer with NAT rules for ssh connections.
